title: CSV DIH Sample
description:
Hi,

I am struggling with DIH and a Pipe Separated file.
Does anyone have sample code for pipe delimted file (schema and config file)
With my current scenario, I run DIH but I am not getting anything that directs me to where my issues are, like a nice error message or a log entry
I want to use DIH to index the file as I want to treat certain exceptions and data transformations
Thanks in advance for the assistance.

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: This kind of issue is best asked on the Solr Users mailing list. Jira is for the issues against Solr code that are bug/problems/etc.

comments.author: Moenieb
comments.content:

sent request to mail list
